name: Metall War
description:
This is first version of "Metall war". Here you can find:
  • 9 types of weapons(in future will be more).
  • Some enemies.
  • 1 map(n future will be more).
This small game is from Russia! I will update it and add new weapons, maps and enemies. Next update will be with BOSSES! Don`t miss it!
